methods.name: addRoot
methods.desc:
Creates two boxes and adds a merkle root
using a  to the root box map and also a list type to the
metadata attached to the root in the data box map

args.name: pmt
args.desc: the fee to cover box storage allocation

args.name: name
args.desc: the name alias of the root being added

args.name: root
args.desc: a merkle tree root

args.name: schema
args.desc: an index of the schema enum from box storage

args.name: type
args.desc: an index of the tree type enum from box storage

methods.name: deleteRoot
methods.desc: Deletes the merkle root from the root box map

args.name: name
args.desc: the name of the merkle tree root

methods.name: updateRoot
methods.desc: Replaces the merkle root with another

args.name: name
args.desc: the name of the merkle group data

args.name: newRoot
args.desc: the new 32 byte merkle tree root

methods.name: addData
methods.desc:
Registers a key & value in the data box map that
corresponds to a merkle root in the root box map

args.name: pmt
args.desc: the payment to cover the increased mbr of adding to box storage

args.name: name
args.desc: the name of the merkle tree root

args.name: key
args.desc: the metadata key eg.

args.name: value
args.desc: the metadata value eg.  encoded as a bytestring for 5%

methods.name: deleteData
methods.desc: Deletes a metadata key & value pair from the data box map

args.name: name
args.desc: the name of the merkle tree root

args.name: key
args.desc: the metadata key you want to remove

methods.name: verify
methods.desc: verify an inclusion in a double sha256 based merkle tree

args.name: address
args.desc: the address of the merkle tree root creator

args.name: name
args.desc: The name alias of the root

args.name: leaf
args.desc: The hashed leaf to verify

args.name: proof
args.desc: The merkle proof

args.name: type
args.desc: The type check for the lists purpose

returns.desc: a boolean indicating whether the proof is valid

args.name: address
args.desc: the address of the merkle tree root creator

args.name: name
args.desc: the name of the merkle tree root

args.name: key
args.desc: the metadata key eg.

returns.desc: the value set eg.  encoded as a bytestring for 5%

methods.name: verifiedRead
methods.desc:
Read metadata from box storage and verify the data provided is included
in the merkle tree given a sha256'd 32 byte merkle tree root & a proof
thats pre-computed off chain.


verify an inclusion in a merkle tree
& read an associated key value pair
& check against the underlying data's schema
& check against the underlying data's list type or purpose

args.name: address
args.desc: the address of the merkle tree root creator

args.name: name
args.desc: the name of the root

args.name: leaf
args.desc: the leaf node to be verified

args.name: proof
args.desc: the proof the hash is included

args.name: type
args.desc:
the list type that helps contracts ensure
the lists purpose isn't being misused ( 0 if the caller doesnt care )

args.name: key
args.desc: the metadata key eg.
